text: alm telm- 'ayuha alnby- 'ana allah subhanah yasjud lah khadeana mnqadana man fi alsmwat min almalayikat wman fi al'ard min almkhlwqat walshams walqamar walnujum waljibal walshajar waldwab? walilah yasjud taeat wakhtyarana kthyr min alnas, wahum almwmnwn, wakathir min alnaas haqa ealayh aleadhab fahu mhyn, way 'iinsan yhnh allah falays lah ahd ykrmh. 'iina allah yafeal fi khalaqah ma yasha' wafq hkmth
